verbose_text: A decrease in malonyl-CoA prevents the inhibition of carnitine :p almitoyl-CoA transferase-1 (CPT-1), which is responsible for long-chain fatty acyl-CoA transport into mitochondria and fatty acid synthase controlling FA biosynthesis [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: malonyl-CoA prevents the inhibition of carnitine:palmitoyl-CoA transferase-1 (CPT-1
